properties.Name: Patio Andaluz
properties.Notes: In the 1960's The Royal Jesters rented used the building as a venue, rehearsal hall, and office.

properties.Name: La Música de la San Anto
properties.Address: 1303 West Commerce Street, San Antonio, TX 78207, United States of America
properties.Notes: A mural by David Blancas as tribute to the lives and music of San Antonio-based musicians.

properties.Name: Del Bravo Record Shop

properties.Name: The Squeezebox
properties.Address: 2806 North Saint Mary's Street, San Antonio, TX 78212, United States of America
properties.Notes: The dive bar has been dubbed, “The Sounds & Soul of San Anto on the St. Mary’s Strip.”

properties.Name: The Lighthouse Lounge

properties.Name: Tiffany Lounge
properties.Notes: Popular downtown nightclub which welcomed integrated audiences and bands.

properties.Name: Keyhole Club
properties.Notes: Popular Eastside nightclub and venue. "In 1946, a newspaper article touted Don’s Keyhole as the finest nightspot for entertainment featuring one of the best floor shows in San Antonio."
